i* A system to develop an easier, faster, profitable and 

a reliable trading system and a website which 

facilitates both computer and mobile access 

 

* This system provides a mobile application and a web 

application which the sellers and buyers could access 

easily and send their assets they possess and what 

buyers need to buy to the web based system. This will 

store the orders as well as the requests that are sent 

by the farmers to buy their products. Then the orders 

and the requests will be matched by the 

administrators and the products will be transported to 

the nearest buyer at the right time

 6A’s, 2B’s, 1C 
 

Working Experience 

Intern Software Engineer at IFS R&D (Pvt) Ltd 
September 2017-March 2018 
 
Worked in a research and development project called “Contact Capture” 
in the Supply Chain team.The idea of this project is to create a 
meaningful contact from the unstructured data by identifying the contact 
details. Mainly used methodologies are NLP and Machine Learning. An 
API system was developed to  integrate with IFS Enterprise application. 
Technologies :- Python, Java, JQuery,RESTful, Flask

November 2013 ─ November 2014  

 Wisdom Business Academy, Colombo 3, Sri Lanka

mailto:senthuran.manoharan@gmail.com
http://www.linkedin.com/in/senthuran-manoharan


 
 

 

Personal Skills and Abilities 

 Self-motivated, enthusiasm to 
learn new things.  

 Experience in leadership and also a 
good team player. 

 Strong ability to take a logical and 
analytical approach in solving 
problems and resolving issues. 

 Proficient in written and oral 
communication skills in English, 
Tamil and Sinhala Languages. 

 

Extra-Curricular Activities

member of Royal College Tamil 
Literary Society, Chemistry Club 
and various other societies

Dr.L.Ranathunga   

Head of the Department

Faculty of Information Technology 
University of Moratuwa 
Email: lochandaka@uom.lk   
Phone: +94 71 220 7030 

  

Dr. Sagara Sumathipala 

Senior Lecturer  
Department of Computational 
Mathematics, 
Faculty of Information Technology 
University of Moratuwa  
Email: sagaras@uom.lk  
Phone: +94 77 693 5825   
 

 

 

Projects 

Predicting the movie success through text analysis – Final Year 
Research Project [Ongoing] 

 A Research and development project 
 Enhance the success of the movie before going into 

production by analyzing the plot (synopsis). 
 Used NLP and Machine Learning to find the genre, 

emotion, Lead role and user rating for the synopsis of 
the movie. 

 Technologies – Python,  NLP, Machine Learning   

Customer Relationship Management System – Software Based 
Project (Level 2) 

 A Project completed under the Course Module 
“Industry Based Project – Level 2”. The project was 
mentored by Cleato (Pvt) Ltd 

 This system was developed to manage the both the 
customers/clients and staff of the software company. 

 A Web based application and a mobile app was 
developed. 

 Technologies - Java, Android, Bootstrap,  MySQL. 

Fire Fighting Robot-Hardware Based Project (Level 1) 

 A Project completed under the requirements for the 
Course Module “ICT Project – Level 1”. 

 Build a robot that used to extinguish the fire by 
identifying the location of fire by using a camera and it 
is controlled by a RF module. 

 The whole system was controlled by RF module and 
water pumping system was developed to extinguish the 
fire. 

 Technologies- PIC Microcontroller, Embedded System, 
RF Module and MPLAB 

 
 

 

I hereby declare that all the information given is correct to the best 
of my knowledge.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
Date: 10.10.2018 (M.SENTHURAN)
